entry.title: The Carry-On Roller in Grey
entry.summary:
Vendor: Beach House Group
Type: Luggage
Price: 198.00

Description

The security line is a breeze with our carry-on-friendly roller, 360* smooth-rolling wheels make getting where you're going absolutely effortless. A trolley handle with a cushioned, silicone grip to ensure your hand never feels the stress of travel and an interior that expands an extra two inches, so wherever you go, you can bring a little something back (even if it is just a tan)! Béis Limited Lifetime Luggage Warranty included.
Specifications

Dims: 14"W x 9"D x 22"H
Material: Polycarbonate PVC Polyester Nylon Zipper Hardware
Care: Spot Clean
Weight: 8.36lbs
Details

EXTERIOR
durable hard sided 100% virgin PolyCarbonate (virgin materials guarantee a higher durability)
gradient 3D stripe design
Hinomoto 360 degree wheels
extendable BÉIS logo-ed ( lengths ) (contrast on black) trolley handle with soft hand cushion for comfort
BÉIS logo retractable bag attach strap - HOLDS UP TO 15LBS
BÉIS embossed logo
top carry handle
side carry handle with weight limit indicator
TSA locks  For instructions see here.
expandable (expands to 12" ) with zipper puller that indicates which zipper expands the luggage
water resistant zipper tape
capacity 40LBS. **we recommend that you adhere to airlines guidelines, please check with your airline for weight limit restrictions

INTERIOR
butterfly opening (for easy packing/unpacking)
lined with durable, easy to spot clean, 75D (polyester) with soft brushed hand feel
U-zip flap, with contrast faux leather trim, includes one zip pocket & one frosted PVC zip pocket
detachable, compression flap with U-zip pocket and mesh packet
four point compression straps
zip pouch for keeping small valuables
separate pouch set for dirty clothes, shoes, under garments, damp clothing

PERFECT FOR
Travel
Air Travel
Carry on

entry.title: The 26" Check-In Roller in Grey
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type: Luggage
Price: 258.00

Description

WARNING: baggage claim is about to get chic! You're going places and our durable check-in rolling luggage is going to get all your stuff there! This smooth rolling 26" luggage holds everything you need without going over the baggage weight limit, thanks to the handy weight limit indicator that lets you know that your baggage may need to lose a few L-Bs! Two inches of optional expansion, compression flaps and straps with pockets galore, keep everything organized and ensure that the only organizing you will be doing on your trip is finding which restaurant serves the best pizza! TSA-approved combination lock is the cherry, and peace of mind, on top. Béis Limited Lifetime Luggage Warranty included.
Specifications

Dims: 16"W x 11"D x 28.25"H Material: Polycarbonate PVC Polyester Nylon Zipper Hardware
Care: Spot Clean
Weight: 10.2lbs
Details

durable hard sided 100% virgin PolyCarbonate (virgin materials guarantee a higher durability)
gradient 3D stripe design
Hinomoto 360 degree wheels
extendable BÉIS logo-ed ( lengths ) (contrast on black) trolley handle with soft hand cushion for comfort
BÉIS logo retractable bag attach strap - HOLDS UP TO 15LBS
BÉIS embossed logotop carry handle
side carry handle with weight limit indicator
TSA locks  here.
expandable (expands an extra 2" ) with zipper puller that indicates which zipper expands the luggage
water resistant zipper tape
capacity 99LBS. **we recommend that you adhere to airlines guidelines, please check with your airline for weight limit restrictions

INTERIOR
butterfly opening (for easy packing/unpacking)
lined with durable, easy to spot clean, 75D (polyester) with soft brushed hand feel
U-zip flap, with contrast faux leather trim, includes one zip pocket & one frosted PVC zip pocket

entry.title: The Convertible Mini Weekender in Grey
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:
Price: 88.00

Description

Introducing the mini to our original Weekender, but better, because this lady has a bottom compartment that zips off completely! Same amount of function packed into a smaller silhouette! A bottom compartment that completely zips off so that this bag can go from Carry-On to Cocktails with just little zip zip zip!
Specifications

Dims: 16"W x 16"H x 8"D
Material: Body - Cotton/Polyester
Trim - PU
Strap - Polyester
Lining - Polyester
Care: Spot Clean
Weight: 3.4lbs
Details

EXTERIOR
Rolled shoulder straps for easy carry, adjustable-removable shoulder/crossbody strap
Wire frame double zip opening/closure, opens wide to see inside
Double zip removable bottom compartment with water resistant lining
Trolley pass through with zipper, to create pocket when not in use
External zip pocket for small items

INTERIOR
Padded laptop sleeve pocket with Velcro strap closure
Large zip pocket and two small slip pockets
Lined with durable, easy to wipe clean, polyester, water-resistant lining
Key-ring strap with dog clip to attach keys for quick access
 
PERFECT FOR
Day Trips
Easy Overnights
Work Days
Gym Stuff
Mom Life
Carry-On

entry.title: The Weekender in Grey
entry.summary:
Vendor: Beach House Group
Type: Shopping Totes
Price: 98.00

Description

We designed this bag to take the hassle out of packing for the weekend or whichever days you’re away. Seriously, this tote’s easy-access opening makes getting everything in and out a breeze (no flashlight required). Plus, the bottom compartment is designed to keep your shoes, toiletries and travel essentials separate—you can even stash a hair dryer in there. Bonus points: there’s a zipper-pocket on the back that becomes a trolley sleeve so it fits over your luggage handle. Hello, carry-on.

 
Specifications

Dims: 19"W x 10"D x 16"H
Material: Body - Cotton/Polyester, Trim - PVC, Strap - Polyester, Lining - Polyester
Care: Spot Clean
Weight : 3.86lbs
Details

EXTERIOR
durable canvas (beige) OR polyester (black) material featuring easy to wipe clean faux patent trim
12" drop partially rolled handle for easy carry
wire frame double zip opening/closure - opens wide to see inside
double zip around bottom compartment with water resistant lining
trolley pass through with zipper - to create pocket when not in use
external zip pocket for small items (keys, phone, boarding pass, passport, sunnies, lip gloss)
embossed BÉIS logo on bottom left
INTERIOR
padded laptop sleeve pocket with velcro strap closure
large zip pocket and two small slip pockets
lined with durable, easy to wipe clean, polyester, water-resistant lining
key-ring strap with dog clip to attach keys for quick access
PERFECT FOR
Travel
Luggage Storage
Protecting your luggage

entry.title: The Sport Duffle in Black
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:
Price: 88.00

Description
The ultimate in gym duffles! With handles to easily grab, a padded crossbody and shoulder strap for the long haul, stow-away padded backpack straps and a trolley sleeve to slip over your luggage handle for when you're really on-the-go - this bag was made to move with you, in literally every way! Designed to fit perfectly in a gym locker but so good looking you'll never want to hide it away!

 
Specifications

Dims: 10"H x 17"W x 8.5"D
Materials: Exterior - Wrinkle Nylon, Interior - Recycled Poly
Care: Spot Clean, Lay Flat to Dry

 
Details

DETAILS:
Compact duffle shape - sized perfectly to fit into a gym locker
4 ways to carry
hand-held straps with wrap
Removable & adjustable padded shoulder strap for shoulder of crossbody carry
EXTERIOR
Hidden padded backpack straps on bottom
Branded padded pull handle to easily grab and go or hang from a locker hook
Side elasticized slip pocket
Front cargo zip pocket
Trolley sleeve with zipper - so you can use as slip pocket when not traveling
Exterior quick-access zip pocket for fun at top seam
INTERIOR
2 large elasticized slip pocket
1 large zip pocket
2 mesh zip pockets
Included is a ‘DIRT BAG’ for dirty clothing, shoes, etc.

How you can move with this product
Perfect gym bag - sized to fit into gym lockers
On-the-go - multi ways to carry

entry.title: The Travel Yoga Mat
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:
Price: 48.00

Description
Yoga, stretching, ab work or just a little Savasana - however you decide you want to move today this lightweight mat will get you through it. Designed to roll up and be toted around with it's own included strap or tucked into the straps of your favorite MOVES style. Namaste!
Specifications

Dims: 26"H x 70"W x 4mm
Materials: Thermoplastic Elastomer (TPE); Poly webbing strap.
Care: Spray with warm water & a few drops of dish soap or a 3:1 water to vinegar solution. Wipe clean with a damp towel or sponge. Do not leave out in the sun. Do not fold but roll for storage.

 
Details
Made of biodegradable TPE synthetic rubber
Roll up and secure with included strap for easy carry and storage
Engraved BEIS Logo
Light weight

How you can move with this product
Yoga, pilates, any work out that you need a little extra padding! Naps :)

entry.title: The Hanging Shower Caddy
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:
Price: 34.00

Description

Getting clean never felt so ... clean. This shower caddy was designed to drain and dry so you can get on with your day after that intense (or not so) workout. The mesh material is quick drying and will ensure no pools of water collect. Just enough room for all your shower needs and a few extra necessities.
Specifications

Dims: 9.5"H x 4.5"W x 5"D
Materials: PVC
Care: Clean with warm water and soap, air dry

 
Details
DETAILS:
The you gym friendly shower caddy
Mesh material for easy draining and drying
Easy to hang over a shower head, on a hook or clipped over a towel bar
Front flap folds down to show interior
Mesh panel keeps products upright for easy storage and display
Elastic loops for a tooth brush and/or razor
Exterior side zip pocket

How you can move with this product
Cosmetics & toiletries
Shower caddy for gym and beyond
Travel

entry.title: The Sport Wristlet Set
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:
Price: 34.00

Description
At first glance this little beauty might look like a cute wristlet, but she is SO much more. Each piece was designed so that you could carry them as a set or individually. The d-ring on each pouch can also be attached to the inside of any BÉIS bag, using our signature key fob (you can find this on interior seam of every BÉIS bag). Even better, the small snap card case comes with a scruchie, take it for a spin on it's own and never have a reason you can't pull your hair back!

 
Specifications

Dims: CREDIT CARD HOLDER: 2.625"H x 3.875"W
ROUND ZIP POUCH: 3.5"W X 3.5"H
RECTANGLE ZIP POUCH: 4.25"H X 7.5"W
Materials: CREDIT CARD HOLDER: Exterior - PU, Interior - Recycled Poly
ROUND AND RECTANGLE POUCHES: Exterior - Wrinkle Nylon, Interior - Recycled Poly
STRAP: Macrame Nylon Paracord
Care: Spot Clean, Lay Flat to Dry

 
Details
DETAILS:
The perfect set of accessories to keep all your gym (and beyond) needs organized
3 different pouches:
1 round zip pouch with an interior elasticized slip pocket - perfect for airpods, earbuds, hair accessories, jewelry
1 long zip pouch - perfect for cash, a few makeup items
1 snap envelope pouch perfect for cards - includes a removable scrunchie that can be used to slip the pouch on your wrist or throwing your hair in a pony
Multiple ways to carry
Carry all three together or individually with the provided braided paracord wristlet strap
D-rings on each style so you can easily clip into any BEIS bag’s included key leash
The envelope pouch can slip onto wrist alone using removable scrunchie
How you can move with this product
On-the-go - hike, bike, walk, run, skip, jump, skate
The perfect necessities only gym companion

entry.title: The Water Bottle Sling in Beige
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:
Price: 38.00

Description
We are all for extreme sports but there is something nice about a good stroll around the neighborhood. The Water Bottle Sling is like a small handbag with added hydration benefits. Just enough space to hold your water bottle, phone, your keys and a credit card! Brisk walks have met their match!

 
Specifications

Dims: BOTTLE BAG: 8.25”H x 3.5”W x 3.5”D
ZIPPER POUCH: 6.75”H X 3.5” W X 0.75”D
Materials: Exterior - Wrinkle Nylon, Interior - Recycled Poly
Care: Spot Clean, Lay Flat to Dry

 
Details

DETAILS:
A crossbody bag big enough for the essentials & securely holds your water bottle
2 ways to carry
Adjustable strap to carry shoulder or crossbody
Side web handle to carry hand-held
EXTERIOR
U-zip cargo pocket - sized to fit up to an Iphone 12
Secure slip pocket inside cargo pocket
INTERIOR
Drawstring & cord lock closure to cinch around water bottle
Fits up to 32 OZ water bottles

entry.title: The Sport Pack in Beige
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:
Price: 44.00

Description
Anyone can design a fanny pack - but this one is a little different. We designed this bag with the hikers in mind. Fits snug to the body with easy access to anything you might need, super light weight and extra d-rings to hook on all the extras. We've also included a handy strap to secure your water bottle to! The bonus paracord is great when you need to repel out of any situation but we personally think it just looks really cool.

 
Specifications

Dims: 6"H x 16"W x 4"D
Materials: Exterior - Wrinkle Nylon, Interior - Recycled Poly
Care: Spot Clean, Lay Flat to Dry

 
Details

DETAILS:
Sleek - body hugging fanny pack
2 ways to carry
Around waist
As a sling/crossbody
EXTERIOR
Adjustable strap to wear multiple ways and tighten for a close fit
2 small d-rings - and 1 large d-ring to hang keys, water bottle, carabiner
extra web loop to secure most water bottle to straps
Body-side zip pocket
Braided paracord - just in case you get caught in need of a rope
INTERIOR
Double zip opening - open and close easily no matter what side you wear your bag on
Key-leash to easily locate keys or clip to any pouch with a d-ring
Zip pocket with 3 CC slips

How you can move with this product
On-the-go - hike, bike, walk, run, skip, jump, skate

entry.title: Stroller Straps
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type: Diaper Bag
Price: 18.00

Description
Pretty simple - turn any bag - with d-rings that you would normally strap a removable strap to - and turn it into a diaper bag. All you need is our Tote Insert and these Stroller Straps and you've pretty much just made your own innovative mom (or dad) on the go bag!
Specifications
Dims: 10" Loop
Materials: Poly Webbing with silicone grip
Care: Spot Clean
Weight: 0.25lbs

 
Details

- logo straps with snap hooks to wrap around stroller handles and connect any diaper bag with d-rings
- silicone grip on poly webbing prevents slippage
PERFECT FOR
-Baby Needs
-Travel
-Work Tote
-Carry-on

entry.title: The Pumping Backpack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type: Diaper Bag
Price: 88.00

Description
Believe it or not, the BEIS office is no stranger to the whirring sound of a breast pump. We are pretty open about our needs when it comes to how we tote around our stuff and the need to have a place to stash your breast pump was not lost on this team! The genius lies in the fact that this doubles as Mama's work bag, comes with a removable pouch for storing parts, keeping them separate, easy to grab and clean as well as the bonus of not looking like you're carrying around a glorified milk-machine! We've added an insulated compartment in this backpack to easily and safely get that liquid gold from point A to point B.
Specifications
Dims: 14" W x 16" H x 7" D
Materials: Body: Nylon Twill, Trim: Buffalo PU, Jelly PVC (Pouch), Lining: 100% Poly, Hardware: Zinc Alloy
Care: Spot Clean
Weight: 2.5lbs

 
Details
EXTERIOR
- compartment specifically for your pump ( fit's most pumps)- with a zipper opening
to feed tubes through on the exterior and an opening to feed the power cord through
- padded shoulder straps
- top handles - easy to grab and go
- 4 exterior slip pockets
- trolley sleeve
INTERIOR
- interior zip pocket
- padded laptop sleeve
- 2 interior slip pockets
- comes with water proof zip pouch
PERFECT FOR
-Baby Needs
-Travel
-Work Tote
-Carry-on

entry.title: The ID Wristlet in Beige
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:
Price: 18.00

Description
Just the  necessities - that is all there is room for in this anything but ordinary wristlet. Enough room for a couple cards, a clear window for your ID and a wristlet strap that you can wear or clip to a bag. This small but mighty must have accessory is perfect for travel or everyday use. 

 
Shay's Inspo

“This little wristlet may look small, but (much like the BÉIS team) small can be quite mighty! This little piece keeps all your essentials in one cute and compact place ensuring you can access everything you may need in a moment’s notice.” — Shay

 
Details
WRISTLET STRAP
Easy to carry or strap to a bag
CC SLOTS
For keeping it all together on-the-go.
ID SLOT
Always prepared to flash

entry.title: The ID Wristlet in Black
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:
Price: 18.00

Description

Do you have trouble keeping all of your personal information together when you're traveling because of how many credit cards and IDs you have? BÉIS has created just the wallet for you.

Just the necessities - we help you set your priorities with a minimal approach for in this simply chic and sleek black wristlet wallet. This signature product was designed with enough room for a couple of credit cards, a clear view window for your ID card along with a wrist strap that you can wear to add the wallet and your everyday essentials, or clip it to a cute handbag. This small but mighty must-have accessory is perfect for travel or everyday use.

Description

BÉIS has created a crossbody sling bag perfect for everyday use when carrying all of your essentials! The Puffer Sling is an adjustable crossbody bag that was inspired from winter-wear trends to be an extension of your favorite winter coat, although still suitable year round. The adjustable padded shoulder strap and large main compartment make it easy to carry winter gear essentials, gym clothing and other smaller items like your cell phone, laptop, tablet, or credit cards.

The ability to pack everything you need in one accessible place for when you need it is a feature sometimes not prioritized in regular backpack designs. The sling backpack design distributes the weight of the shoulder bag across the chest and body evenly for extra protection, easing strain on your neck and back muscles. And with a durable polyester fabric, you can rest assured that your belongings will stay safe and dry from any wet conditions.
 
Shay's Inspo

“This is a new style for us, brought to life after I dreamt up my perfect bag for on the go. Sampled it, used it, loved it and here we are. This is a new style of bag for us. I used it and love it. One shoulder easy to use perfect for on the go.” — Shay

 
Details
PUFFED UP!
Cozy winter vibes - ready for your ski adventure
SIDE-ZIP COMPARTMENT
Everything has its place
ADJUSTABLE, PADDED SHOULDER STRAP
Multiple ways to carry

entry.title: The Puffer Duffle in Black
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:
Price: 98.00

Description
If you're looking for a new winter shoulder bag that can carry all of your winter essentials effortlessly, you've found the perfect product. The Black Puffer Tote from BÉIS is a chic handbag that converges fashion and functionality to make the perfect sized edition to our tote collection and a purchase you won't regret. The Puffer Tote comes equipped with a water-resistant bottom compartment for all your wet ski gear, a padded laptop sleeve, and a hidden cell phone pocket, making winter adventures a piece of cake! 

 
Specifications

Dims: 19.75"W x 11.75"H x 11.75"D
Materials: Body: 100% polyester fabric
Trim: 100% saffiano PU
Lining 1: 100% 210D polyester
Lining 2: waterproof lining
Care: Spot clean
Weight: 2.4

- Separate zipped shoe compartment

INTERIOR

- Padded Laptop sleeve (fits up to a 13" macbook pro)

entry.title: The Puffer Duffle in Beige
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:
Price: 98.00

Description
Designed to be noticed our ski-inspired duffle is enough to get you to the mountains and back - and anywhere in between. Whether you are hitting the slopes or heading out for an outdoor weekend adventure this puffy duffle is sure to keep you organized with an abundance of zip pockets, an exterior compartment for shoes or wet hat and gloves, padded sleeve for your laptop and multiple ways to carry.

 
Shay's Inspo

“This duffle is the newer, better version of our beloved first duffle (no shade to our OG). We added some features after learning what the first one was missing, and this bag now truly has it all. I love not only that it’s cute, round and chic, but because it fits into lockers, behind the seat of your car, or in the overhead compartment. Dope little bag, no doubt.” — Shay

Cozy winter vibes - ready for your ski adventure

Everything has its place.

Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:

Description
Gear up for the winter season with The Puffy Tote. This perfect sized edition to our tote collection comes with all the winter fun necessities, including a water resistant bottom compartment for all your wet ski gear (or bathing suit if you’re not a snow bunny), a padded laptop sleeve and a hidden cell phone pocket - so documenting your adventures is never a task of hide & seek.

 
Shay's Inspo

“To me, this bag exemplifies the fabrication and highlights everything I love about this style. It’s perfectly shaped, sized and has features galore on the inside, too, to make it just as functional and is it fashionable.” — Shay
